text: - Covestro is a global chemical company

you can find our products
almost everywhere

in car industries, within
the clothing industries,

for example, in your shoes
and also at your home.
(upbeat music)

We have decided to build the
Covestro analytics platform
on AWS as our first product on AWS,
because data is so important for us,
and we have so much data within Covestro
and from our customers.
And we need those data to produce
and develop even better products.

We used AWS Professional
Services to support
the development of our analytics platform,

and they helped us by
designing our architecture,
the target architecture,
how to set up a huge analytics platform.

We have tried that before
in our old environment
and after one year we were not ready.

Now within AWS, we have
restarted that project

and we are able to establish
our Covestro analytics platform
within less than six months.
The core services we decided

for our Covestro analytics
platform is Amazon S3

as our core data lake
to store all our data
from different sources.
Beside that we use Amazon Stage Maker
and AWS Glue as additional services
and we are going to plan to integrate
even more services from AWS here.

If you look at our AWS
cloud environment today
we can already see that

we can lift cost benefits
in different areas.
One major benefit for our business,
for our business colleagues

and the different
departments within Covestro

is that we can really
give them the environment
they need for testing environments,
testing products extremely fast.
Data scientists use labor of the data
they can ingest data as much as they want.
Find the right patterns within the data.
Moving into the cloud

from a technical point
of view is one thing,
but to choose the right design,
to choose the right operating model,
AWS Professional Services understood
what are our challenges, what our demands
and helps us designing
the right lending zone environment at AWS

and also the right target
architecture for Covestro.

We want to explore together
with AWS Professional Services

what else we can use and
with what kind of services

we can benefit for our
business, for our products,
and that is the next new step.
And here we want to utilize

AWS Professional Services
as much as possible.
